sqlMap.select: SELECT project_log_id as projectLogId, project_id as projectId, update_by as updateBy, project_field as projectField, project_old_value as projectOldValue, project_new_value as projectNewValue, update_date as updateDate, remarks as remarks, change_type as changeType, fGetGeneralCodeCaption(change_type) as changeTypeCaption FROM project_log WHERE project_id IN ( SELECT project_id FROM project WHERE project_status IN ('PR_STAT_04', 'PR_STAT_98', 'PR_STAT_99') AND ( (project_status LIKE 'PR_STAT_04' AND (TO_CHAR(ACT_END_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') < TO_CHAR((SYSDATE-TO_NUMBER(FGETGENERALPARAMETERVALUE('logKeepingDays'))),'yyyy-MM-dd'))) OR (project_status LIKE 'PR_STAT_98' AND (TO_CHAR(ACT_END_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') < TO_CHAR((SYSDATE-TO_NUMBER(FGETGENERALPARAMETERVALUE('logKeepingDays'))),'yyyy-MM-dd'))) OR (project_status LIKE 'PR_STAT_99' AND (TO_CHAR(UPDATE_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') < TO_CHAR((SYSDATE-TO_NUMBER(FGETGENERALPARAMETERVALUE('logKeepingDays'))),'yyyy-MM-dd'))) ) )
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM project_log WHERE project_id IN ( SELECT project_id FROM project WHERE project_status IN ('PR_STAT_04', 'PR_STAT_98', 'PR_STAT_99') AND ( (project_status LIKE 'PR_STAT_04' AND (TO_CHAR(ACT_END_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') < TO_CHAR((SYSDATE-TO_NUMBER(FGETGENERALPARAMETERVALUE('logKeepingDays'))),'yyyy-MM-dd'))) OR (project_status LIKE 'PR_STAT_98' AND (TO_CHAR(ACT_END_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') < TO_CHAR((SYSDATE-TO_NUMBER(FGETGENERALPARAMETERVALUE('logKeepingDays'))),'yyyy-MM-dd'))) OR (project_status LIKE 'PR_STAT_99' AND (TO_CHAR(UPDATE_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') < TO_CHAR((SYSDATE-TO_NUMBER(FGETGENERALPARAMETERVALUE('logKeepingDays'))),'yyyy-MM-dd'))) ) )
